_comment: Firmware Static Analysis Pipeline Configuration Template (Multi-Toolchain)
_libclang_info: Absolute path to libclang shared library (optional if LIBCLANG_PATH environment variable is set)
_project_files_info: Provide ONLY the file relevant to your selected toolchain
_keil_project_info: Path to Keil .uvprojx project file (used if toolchain = keil)
_visualgdb_project_info: Path to VisualGDB .vcxproj file (used if toolchain = visualgdb)
_compile_commands_info: Path to existing compile_commands.json (used if toolchain = compile_commands)
_stub_dir_info: Directory containing ARMCC compatibility stubs (only required for Keil)
_armcc_stub_header_info: Stub header included before parsing to emulate ARMCC environment (Keil only)
_target_info: Compilation target triple passed to clang (optional override)
_mcpu_info: Target MCU core (e.g. cortex-m3, cortex-m4, cortex-m7, cortex-m33)
_output_paths_info: All output artifacts generated by the analysis pipeline
